meanings.definition: The quality or state of being various.
meanings.sent1: The variousness of colors in the painting made it truly beautiful.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the variousness of flavors in this dish.
meanings.sent3: The variousness of ice cream flavors at the shop always confuses me.
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe showed a variousness of styles, from elegant to casual.
meanings.sent5: The variousness of flowers in the garden created a stunning display of colors.

meanings.definition: The condition of having many different types or forms.
meanings.sent1: The variousness of shapes in the puzzle made it challenging to solve.
meanings.sent2: The variousness of animals in the zoo delighted the visitors.
meanings.sent3: The variousness of shoe styles in the store made it hard to choose.
meanings.sent4: The variousness of clouds in the sky resembled a painting.
meanings.sent5: The variousness of books in the library catered to all interests.
